orderId.description: Typically used for a reference ID provided by the Consumer Reporting Agency (CRA) specific to the order itself. Can often be used as a lookup value in the CRA's client portal.

statusMessage.description: Overall status of order.  Typically would be reflective of a value like Pending, Complete, etc. Specific to each Consumer Reporting Agency (CRA).

reportLink.description: A link to the background screening report.
